Mutation++  v1.0.0
Multicomponent Thermodynamic And Transport Properties for Ionized gases in C++
air_diffusion_comparison.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "mutation++.h"
2 #include <vector>
3 #include <iostream>
4 
5 #include <Eigen/Dense>
6 
7 using namespace Mutation;
8 using namespace Mutation::Numerics;
9 using namespace Mutation::Thermodynamics;
10 using namespace Mutation::Transport;
11 
12 int main()
13 {
14  // Generate the default options for the air11 mixture
15  MixtureOptions opts("air_5");
16  opts.setStateModel("EquilTP");
17 
18  // Change from default thermodynamic database (RRHO) to NASA 9-coefficient
19  // polynomial database
20  opts.setThermodynamicDatabase("RRHO");
21 
22  // Load the mixture with the new options
23  Mixture mix(opts);
24  int ns = mix.nSpecies();
25 
26  Eigen::MatrixXd m_Dij(ns, ns);
27  Eigen::MatrixXd m_ram_Dij(ns, ns);
28  Eigen::VectorXd v_Vd_ram(ns);
29  Eigen::VectorXd v_Vd_sm(ns);
30  Eigen::VectorXd v_Vd(ns);
31  Eigen::VectorXd v_b(ns);
32  Eigen::VectorXd v_rhoi(ns);
33 
34  double E_field = 0.E0;
35 
36  // Loop over range of temperatures and compute equilibrium values at 1 atm
37  double P = ONEATM;
38  double T;
39  double rho;
40 
41  // Defining Driving Forces Respecting the constraint that they should add equal to 1.
42  v_b.setConstant(-1.0);
43  v_b(0) = 1.0 * ( ns - 1 );
44 
45  for (int k = 0; k < 250; ++k) {
46  // Compute the temperature
47  T = 200.0 + static_cast<double>(k) * 200.0;
48 
49  // Set the mixture state equal to the equilibrium state for the given
50  // temperature and pressure
51  mix.setState(&T, &P);
52  rho = mix.density();
53  v_rhoi = rho * Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd>(mix.Y(), ns);
54 
55  // Exact Diffusion Coefficients
56  mix.setDiffusionMatrixAlgo("Exact");
57  m_Dij = mix.diffusionMatrix();
58  v_Vd = -m_Dij*v_b;
59 
60  // Ramsaw Diffusion Coefficients
61  mix.setDiffusionMatrixAlgo("Ramshaw");
62  m_ram_Dij = mix.diffusionMatrix();
63  v_Vd_ram = -m_ram_Dij * v_b;
64 
65  // Comparing with Stefan Maxwell
66  mix.stefanMaxwell( &v_b(0), &v_Vd_sm(0), E_field );
67 
68  // Output
69  std::cout << "Sum of the Fluxes for T = " << T << "K" << std::endl;
70  std::cout << "Exact Diffusion Matrix = " << v_rhoi.dot( v_Vd ) << std::endl;
71  std::cout << "Ramsaw Diffusion Matrix = " << v_rhoi.dot( v_Vd_ram ) << std::endl;
72  std::cout << "Stefan-Maxwell = " << v_rhoi.dot( v_Vd_sm ) << std::endl;
73  std::cout << "Velocities L2 Norm error Between Exact matrix and Ramsaw = " << ( v_Vd_ram - v_Vd ).norm() << std::endl;
74  std::cout << "Velocities L2 Norm error Between Exact matrix and Stefan-Maxwell = " << ( v_Vd_sm -v_Vd ).norm() << std::endl;
75  std::cout << std::endl;
76 
77  } // Loop over temperatures
78 
79  return 0;
80 }
